description: A resource schema for a Variable in Amazon Fraud Detector.

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
The name of the variable.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-z_][a-z0-9_]{0,99}?$  
Update requires: Replacement

DataSource.markdownDescription:
The source of the data.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: EVENT | EXTERNAL_MODEL_SCORE  
Update requires: No interruption

DataType.markdownDescription:
The data type.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: STRING | INTEGER | FLOAT | BOOLEAN  
Update requires: No interruption

DefaultValue.description: The default value for the variable when no value is received.
DefaultValue.markdownDescription:
The default value for the variable when no value is received.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.markdownDescription:
The description.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.markdownDescription:
Tags associated with this variable.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

VariableType.description: The variable type. For more information see https://docs.aws.amazon.com/frauddetector/latest/ug/create-a-variable.html#variable-types
VariableType.markdownDescription:
The variable type. For more information see https://docs.aws.amazon.com/frauddetector/latest/ug/create-a-variable.html#variable-types

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: AUTH_CODE | AVS | BILLING_ADDRESS_L1 | BILLING_ADDRESS_L2 | BILLING_CITY | BILLING_COUNTRY | BILLING_NAME | BILLING_PHONE | BILLING_STATE | BILLING_ZIP | CARD_BIN | CATEGORICAL | CURRENCY_CODE | EMAIL_ADDRESS | FINGERPRINT | FRAUD_LABEL | FREE_FORM_TEXT | IP_ADDRESS | NUMERIC | ORDER_ID | PAYMENT_TYPE | PHONE_NUMBER | PRICE | PRODUCT_CATEGORY | SHIPPING_ADDRESS_L1 | SHIPPING_ADDRESS_L2 | SHIPPING_CITY | SHIPPING_COUNTRY | SHIPPING_NAME | SHIPPING_PHONE | SHIPPING_STATE | SHIPPING_ZIP | USERAGENT  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the variable.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

CreatedTime.description: The time when the variable was created.
CreatedTime.markdownDescription:
The time when the variable was created.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

LastUpdatedTime.description: The time when the variable was last updated.
LastUpdatedTime.markdownDescription:
The time when the variable was last updated.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
